title: muliyadi227
author: muliyadi227
content: MetaDOS: The Next Generation Metaverse Battle Royale Game.Inspired by Apex Legend and In-Time Movie. MetaDOS develops games that focus on the E-sport battle royale mode with a time system (time is currency) along with high-quality graphics.MetaDOS is the Next-gen Metaverse Battle Royale Game because it uses Blockchain technology. Amazingly, MetaDOS is already available on the Steam Platform, but unfortunately for now it hasn't been launched to be played together online, but for now we can try the game offline.Oh yes, while waiting for the launch of the game, for now there is a free Airdrop from MetaDOS, to get Battle Pass+ just by using the MetaMask Wallet and e-mail, and fortunately there is no Gas Fee, Free Mint.If you want to get it, I've made a video on how to claim the Battle Pass+, please: https://youtu.be/pyOHl1Bb3ew (Use CC auto-generated by Youtube for your language)MetaDOS Has a DOSChain network from Avalanche, and there happens to be an Airdrop Free Mint + Free Gas Fee from MetaDOS, maybe friends can use my referral link: https://ref.metados.com/CTsHf4QhUHzdqVZJ8But, if you don't want to use referrals, you can: https://metados.com/battle-passÂ MetaDOS also has several very well-known PARTNERS such as; AVA LABS, LAYER-ZERO, THUNDER CLOUD, ZEN STUDIO, DOS VENTURES, and many others.Related links regarding MetaDOS:- Twitter : https://twitter.com/PlayMetaDOS- Telegram : https://t.me/PlayMetaDOS- Reddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/MetaDOS/- Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/PlayMetaDOS- Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/MetaDOS- Tiktok : https://www.tiktok.com/@playmetados- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/PlayMetaDOSNote: Maybe there is still a lot of other information that I haven't included in this thread, I hope friends who have researched it, can give their opinion or additions.
